New York: New York rents have slightly cooled, with increased concessions for renewals and new leases.
Los Angeles: Los Angeles rents have stabilized but tenants often negotiate free parking or lower security deposits.
Chicago: Chicago rental market remains competitive, but winter months offer tenants more negotiation leverage.
Austin: Austin rents dropped 3.2% year over year, making it easier to negotiate rent reductions or incentives.
Miami: Miami rents have surged, but some buildings offer first-month-free specials.
National: Nationwide, vacancies have risen slightly in 2025, giving tenants more leverage during negotiations.
